  {
    "context": "https://schema.org",
    "type": "WebSite",
    "url": "",
    "name": "",
    "alternateName": "",
    "potentialAction": [
      {
      "type": "ListenAction",
        "target": ""

  }
  



:root {
  --color-bg-dark-bar: #28292a;
  --color-bg-dark: #1a1e24;
  --color-bg-medium: #282c34;
  --color-bg-light: #2e323a;
  --color-text-light: #f0f0f0;
  --color-accent: #00bcd4;
  --color-active-bg: #3b4e60;
  --color-active-text: #e5f3ff;
  --color-border: #3c424a;
  --color-transparent-accent: rgba(155, 186, 211, 0.2);
  --color-spinner-border: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.3);
  --color-error-text: #ff4d4d;

  --font-main: 'Google Sans Text', Arial, sans-serif;
  --font-size-base: 15px;
  --font-size-station-name: 1.4rem;
  --font-size-list-item: 1.2rem;

  --player-button-size: 2.3rem;
  --icon-size: 24px;
  --spinner-size: 20px;

  --border-radius-main: 5px;
  --list-item-padding: 15px 20px;

  --transition-color-bg: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease;
  --transition-default: all 0.3s ease;

  --focus-outline: 2px solid var(--color-accent);
  --focus-outline-offset: 2px;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Google Sans Text';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/googlesanstext/v24/5aUu9-KzpRiLCAt4Unrc-xIKmCU5qEp2iw.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02BB-02BC, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+0304, U+0308, U+0329,
    U+2000-206F, U+20AC, U+2122, U+2191, U+2193, U+2212, U+2215, U+FEFF, U+FFFD;
}

html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
}

* {
  box-sizing: inherit;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
}

*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: inherit;
}

html,
body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: var(--color-bg-dark);
  overflow-y: auto;
  font-family: var(--font-main);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  color: var(--color-text-light);
  transition: var(--transition-color-bg);
}

.radio-player-container {
  max-width: 480px;
  width: 90%;
  margin: 20px auto;
  background-color: var(--color-bg-medium);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  transition: var(--transition-color-bg), box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.radio-player {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: var(--list-item-padding);
  background-color: var(--color-bg-dark-bar);
  border-top-left-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
  border-top-right-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
  flex-shrink: 0;
  color: var(--color-active-text);
  transition: var(--transition-color-bg);
}

.player-button {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--color-accent);
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0;
  margin-right: 15px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: var(--player-button-size);
  height: var(--player-button-size);
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: var(--transition-color-bg);
}

.player-button:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background-color: var(--color-transparent-accent);
}

.player-button:focus-visible {
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
  outline-offset: var(--focus-outline-offset);
}

.player-button:disabled {
  cursor: not-allowed;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

.player-button .icon {
  fill: currentColor;
  width: var(--icon-size);
  height: var(--icon-size);
}

.player-button .pause-icon {
  display: none;
}

.radio-player.playing .player-button .play-icon {
  display: none;
}

.radio-player.playing .player-button .pause-icon {
  display: block;
}

.station-name {
  flex-grow: 1;
  font-size: var(--font-size-station-name);
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.radio-player.error .station-name,
.radio-player.error .player-button {
  color: var(--color-error-text);
}

.loading-spinner {
  border: 3px solid var(--color-spinner-border);
  border-top: 3px solid var(--color-accent);
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: var(--spinner-size);
  height: var(--spinner-size);
  aspect-ratio: 1 / 1;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
  margin-left: 10px;
  display: none;
  will-change: transform;
}

.radio-player.loading .loading-spinner {
  display: block;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

.radio-list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  max-height: calc(100dvh - 105px);
  overflow-y: auto;
  background-color: var(--color-bg-light);
  border-bottom-left-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
  border-bottom-right-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
  flex-grow: 1;
  scroll-padding: 10px;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  scrollbar-width: thin;
  scrollbar-color: var(--color-border) var(--color-bg-dark);
}

.radio-list li {
  padding: var(--list-item-padding);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: var(--font-size-list-item);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  color: var(--color-text-light);
  transition: var(--transition-color-bg);
}

.radio-list li:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.radio-list li:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-transparent-accent);
}

.radio-list li:focus-visible {
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
  outline-offset: var(--focus-outline-offset);
}

.radio-list li.active {
  background-color: var(--color-active-bg);
  color: var(--color-active-text);
  font-weight: bold;
}

.radio-list::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
}

.radio-list::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--color-bg-dark);
}

.radio-list::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-bg-dark);
}

.radio-list::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-accent);
}

#cookieChoiceInfo,
#cookieChoiceInfo * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

#cookieChoiceInfo {
  padding: 1.5rem;
  inset: auto 0 0;
  line-height: 1.5;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  animation: cookies 1s forwards;
  transform: translateY(200%);
}

#cookieChoiceInfo .cookie-choices-inner {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: #fff;
}

#cookieChoiceInfo .cookie-choices-text {
  margin: 0;
  display: inline;
}

#cookieChoiceInfo .cookie-choices-button {
  text-transform: initial;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 0;
}

#cookieChoiceInfo .cookie-choices-button:hover {
  color: #2196f3;
}

@keyframes cookies {
  to {
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}
